website_summaries.verdict: Boosts your metabolism to increase energy without increasing food cravings. It's more affordable than many detox teas on the market.
pros: The majority of users experienced positive results after using this product, including relief from constipation and bloating, and more energy
Smells and tastes better than many detox teas on the market
cons: The small percentage of users agree the tea is great tasting, but didn't result in the desired detoxification results

website_summaries.verdict: A gentle detox tea that promotes well-being while increasing metabolism and proper digestion.
pros: Promotes proper digestion and aids optimization of the digestive tract
Stimulates the body's ability to process excess fats, stimulates blood circulation, and provides essential antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals
Made of the finest organic green tea, spices, and herbs.Doesn’t include the natural laxative senna leaf, so it's more gentle
cons: Without the senna leaf, results may not be as dramatic as with others

customer_reviews.title: This will give you ungodly farts
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes great but it will give you stinky explosive gas like you’ve never before experienced. It’s way too embarrassing to drink and I had gas pains on top of farting very couple seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The taste is good but I did add honey cuz I like sweet ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't own a scale for my own mental safety but I can see that my stomach is flatter after 2 weeks if drinking this tea. I had already reduced drinking my calories and increased my water intake before starting this tea and didn't make any dietary changes. The taste is good but I did add honey cuz I like sweet tea. It doesn't make u run to or live in the bathroom either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Newman

customer_reviews.title: I bought this tea because of the great reviews & I was like looking for something to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea because of the great reviews & I was like looking for something to help with a bloating feeling I’d been having for weeks! I followed the directions & made sure to drink a glass of water before the tea every morning. I feel great! The bloating feeling is gone and I have actually been able to cut my coffee with a lot of cream out of my morning routine! I’ll be buying more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but, this stuff deserves one. Not only does it do what it says it will, it tastes great! As with anything in life you have to do your part but, this helps. Down a total of 50 pounds now and had hit a plateau, this broke through it. 4 pounds in 1 week. Will drink it everyday even when weight goal has been achieved. 9 to go 😀
customer_reviews.author: KLH45

customer_reviews.title: it tastes absolutely amazing! I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I live by this tea! This is the first thing I drink every morning and it really curbs my appetite - plus, it tastes absolutely amazing! I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Pia Rhiner

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned believer
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought this because along my weight loss journey I hit a plateau that I was stuck at for MONTHS. I kept up with my regular workout and healthy eating, but with this tea I got past my plateau and have lost another 5lbs in less than 2 weeks. I’m amazed. Not only that, but my dependency on morning coffee has subsided, and I feel so much better. I’ll definitely be buying this tea again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: What a great waste of money, nothing but a tasty cup of tea. Due to all the BS comments I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Panetta

customer_reviews.title: This tea tastes good, and I felt like it might have suppressed ...
customer_reviews.text: This tea tastes good, and I felt like it might have suppressed my appetite a little, but it is not some magic weight loss drink as they advertise it. Plus, they offer free bags of tea for reviews so now I'm rather skeptical about the number of 5 star reviews for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: taste great! I needed a good cleanse after a summer ...
customer_reviews.text: taste great! I needed a good cleanse after a summer of traveling, eating out and drinking! came home 10 lbs extra! I've lost those10 lbs in 2 weeks but I also have been working out, changed my diet and added this detox! I will be purchasing again when I need to cleanse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want to see results you have to put in the work
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lost weight doing this but it was combined with a 500-750 calories diet and exercise
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lost a few pounds
customer_reviews.text: At first I hated the smell of this tea I think because of the cloves & cinnamon. But I eventually tolerated it. I didn't eat super healthy while taking the tea or hit the gym every day but I did lose 3 pounds over the 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Belledonna Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sick
customer_reviews.text: Horribly ill. I drank this the last 2 days. Today I feel so sick. I can’t eat or drink, I almost puked, and I have watery stool. Maybe this is caused by a release of toxins but I can’t even imagine drinking this again. I’m so tired today I can barely work. I almost called in because I couldn’t get off of the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say it doesn't take bad, but it's not good either. I added a teaspoon or two of honey to mine every morning. Second, I havent lost much weight but I see the numbers moving on the scale so something seems to be going right. Third, I like this product because it makes me feel good. I feel more energized and awake after I drink this tea. I normally drink this tea either with 8 ounces of water or 10 ounces. Depending on the day. I don't think it matters. I do plan on buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: 14 Day Detox Tea
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst tasting tea to me. I threw 12 days worth away. I did try it for 2 days and decided it simply was not worth my time. Delivery was great, packaged well but I certainly would not recommend this and would not try it again.
customer_reviews.author: MzB2U

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Drank every morning as a part of my regular diet/exercise routine. Didn’t help with weight loss. Tasted like cloves, didn’t want to drink it after 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Marin E.

customer_reviews.title: Nausea & headaches :(
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed I wasted money on this product. I really wanted to love this tea. The taste was good. All of the positive reviews made me so excited to try it but after 3 days of this tea I’ve gotten terrible headaches and felt nauseous every day I’ve taken it. I will be throwing the rest of it out. I am well aware that there is no magic trick to losing weight but I was hoping for some kind of a “kick start” to drinking this tea and it’s only brought me to feeling very sick.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Has a free coupon which is fake
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the result of what was suppose to be a detox. The taste was pleasant and did not require a sweetener. The results however, did not match the claims and was dismal. I did use the entire order but results did not get any better. I tried to call about the free coupon inside of the bag for 1 each free Zero Tea 14 Day Detox Tea, Weight Loss Tea. I also on the internet but no dice. Seems to me to be a fake to draw people to by this product!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Early Review, so far SO good
customer_reviews.text: I am only on day 5, but I think it's important to review as I go with something like this. As of now, down 1 full lb (with mild exercise, and no diet change, but lots of water all day every day) and the belly bloat is nearly gone. So far SO good. I will update at the 9 or 10 day mark. Flavor is great, I like it best cold, and doesn't cause bathroom breaks at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried nearly every digestive product on the market; pills, capsules, other tea brands. You name it. But I've never seen better results from a product than I did with Zero Tea. Not only does it work phenomenally, but it tastes absolutely delicious as well. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who struggles with digestive issues or is just looking to shed a few extra pounds. It's absolutely worth it! #zerotea
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Fabricatore

customer_reviews.title: But it did taste good.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions. I eat fairly clean, exercise rigorously, so no results. But it did taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Working for me👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I did this product like it said and in 14 days I was down 10lbs. I did combine good eating habits and worked out as well, but this product really worked as I have been at a Stand still with weight loss for 3 months.... despite working out and eating healthy. I will be ordering another pack of this as I am a firm believer it is working. Thank you Zero tea!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zero Tea Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the mild taste and how my stomach has decreased from 44 inches to 41 inches. Drinking 1 cup first thing in morning after i drink 1 8oz glass of water. I will order more. Thank you Zero Tea your product is Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SUNNY52

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Its been about a month since I purchased 2 bags of this tea. I use the same tea bag twice a day. I am not sure if this is strictly due to the tea, however I have lost 16 pounds in the month I have been using this tea!!! My appetite is cut in half. This is not a strong detox as I have had with other teas. Will be purchasing again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you used before
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and drank 8 oz water before taking the tea and later that night I got so Sick I had to miss work. I puked every hour, had the THe runs really bad, and I have no energy what so ever. I couldn’t even hold my daughter that’s how bad it was :(
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Johnston-ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It truly works
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a bag from a friend of mine as a Christmas gift. And head tried the 14-day detox and absolutely loved the results. I drink it hot and cold, and I have lost inches and 5 lb. So I came and bought another bag to continue with another 14 days Supply.
customer_reviews.author: Milissa Kimball

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea! I’ve noticed that I’m not hungry throughout the day and my cravings have subsided significantly. I’ve already lost 3 pounds over the past week drinking this every day. I did a lot of research on skinny/detox teas before I decided on this one and I’m so glad I did! Not to mention I love the taste!! It doesn’t taste like tree bark! It’s delicious! I’ve even got my coworkers into ordering some!!
customer_reviews.author: Jepatton

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!! Add it to your morning regimen!
customer_reviews.text: This 14 day detox is great! It has a wonderful aroma, and tastes just as great! I have it just as directed right after getting up in the morning before I start my daily morning jog. Not sure if it helps with my workout, but I definitely do feel better and energetic later in the day!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty
customer_reviews.text: This tea is actually pretty good. Great taste and very gentle. I was concerned about the cloves as I’m not a fan but it’s more like cinnamon apple. I also breastfeed so I was concerned about it giving my baby an upset tummy, but he’s be completely unaffected. My only advice would be to drink plenty of water to help with that detox cycle. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Willis

customer_reviews.title: Slimmed down
customer_reviews.text: I was able to slim down my waist a little with drinking this tea with moderate consistency. I did not reach my goal while using this product, but that's simply because I was just cleaning up my diet instead of coupling diet and exercise. Would definitely buy this product again in the next months (you should allow yourself about two months AT LEAST in between detoxes). Btw, since it is a detox, expect to poop. It wasn't as crazy as a colon detox I went on, but it was more than my usual cycle. It only lasted about 3 days, but it could very well last longer for others.
customer_reviews.author: Sena L.

customer_reviews.title: False promotion
customer_reviews.text: The taste is fine but there is no detox benefits at all. The product suggests that it will help metabolism. I had tea every morning while carefully monitoring diet and exercise. Thought this would give boost. It does not. Purchase another herbal tea that does not make false claims. There is an offer for free product if you make good review. This must explain all the great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne R.

customer_reviews.title: What detox?
customer_reviews.text: This product show no results whatsoever... isn’t something happen during a detox?? Like more bathroom visits? How are toxins being released ? I have had no changes occur with this product. When I have done detoxification in the past I felt better, my skin was clearer and my energy was boosted.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea! It not only tastes good but it has helped me gently cleanse as it says. I have less bloating and my clothes fit better already. No it’s not a miracle tea you’re not going to loose 20+ pounds in 2 weeks but if you are looking to jump start your weight loss this is a good product! I’ve read some reviews that stated the tea was to sweet for them so steep it with an earl grey or black tea to cut the sweetness. I enjoy mine iced, definitely has cut my cravings down to nothing. I will order again. Thanks #zerotea
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I works so well I've been drinking it for a month straight.
customer_reviews.text: I hope there is no danger in drinking this tea every day for more than two weeks. I've been drinking it for about six weeks straight. It has decreased my appetite and given me more energy and I want that to continue. I haven't gotten on the scales but I feel really good even after my Cabo vacation. I took it there with me too and after a full day of drinking beer I didn't get the usual bloat. This tea is worth every dime as far as I'm concerned. If it's dangerous to continue drinking it without a break somebody better tell me please. I didn't see anything in the ingredients that could be harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Tyson

customer_reviews.title: First I will start that the tea tastes amazing! I will continue to drink it because I ...
customer_reviews.text: First I will start that the tea tastes amazing! I will continue to drink it because I enjoy it. However, I did not lose any significant weight but I did feel as though I was detoxing/cleansing. I made a conscious effort to eat clean and followed directions. I am going to give this another try and see if the results are better or the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ZeroTea 14 day detox and love it. The smell of the tea along is soothing and the taste is great as well. I've been using the tea for 7 days and my body just feels cleaner and lighter. I truly recommend the tea especially if you're a tea drinker like myself. A different taste to start my day.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this tea with my breakfast daily and noticed a big different in my appetite control. I also work out 4-5x a week along with taking this tea has helped me tone/ lose the daily bloating. It's more of a boosting metabolism tea over detox which I really like, I rather have my metabolism boosted over doing a detox for a few days and go back to where I started from. Definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Rini S.

customer_reviews.title: Try this!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect the results I have gotten from this product. I brew a pot at night, add a little honey and lemon and drink it all the next day. It has really kept me feeling full and eating much less. I don’t feel sick or any side effects. I have lost 10 lbs just sipping this all day long. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dani D.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible stomach ache, do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try a tea detox for the first time in my life. When I opened the bag and found a slip that said “if you write a good review, the next bag is on us” I knew that it might not be all that it was cracked up to be. The first few days were fine and I didn’t feel any side effects. However, towards the end of the detox my stomach feels more bloated than when I started, and I am constipated. I do not recommend this product to anyone. Do not fall for the good reviews, it is simply just people trying to get free product out of a company.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described ans tastes good to boot!
customer_reviews.text: bought this item on a suggestion and it does exactly as described. plus it actually tastes good. some teas do not taste good at all but this one is great. the detox effects are a nice side benefit.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Ou

customer_reviews.title: Be vigilant
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaving negative reviews...but this might help someone else. Am not sure what is in this tea... but it made me sick for days now ...like weak. To make matters worse ...am surprise a detox tea is making me constipated and bloated... that is a bad sign, and possible something unsafe to the digestive system. Be careful don’t mess with your digestive system by drinking this mysterious tea. Make your own healthy green juice
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: As effective as water
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong about this product but after 14 days I got to say it is pretty much useless. It smells ok but still tastes mostly like water after even 15 mins of soaking. Not sure exactly what benefits it provided but I can also safely say that no harm was done. Would skip buying it and continue to drink a healthy glass of water from now!
customer_reviews.author: Rajan

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money..
customer_reviews.text: The taste is not bad but not anything super special. After 4 days of drinking this I don't see any benefits or any negatives. Its just some ok tasting tea.
customer_reviews.author: Designergrl

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this because so many people said it worked and was good. I will admit the taste was pretty good but by the middle of the first day I got terrible cramps and the vomited. I haven't vomited in over 35 years and did not eat anything out of normal this day except for this tea. Afraid to make another cup. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: dlb

customer_reviews.title: I saw a difference
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wasn't expecting to like the tea but it grew on me for sure. It had a cinnamon taste which made it pretty nice. I'm about 140 lbs. 5'6" and I saw a change mostly in my stomach. It looks flatter and I don't get bloated anymore. I feel more energized and that my body was able to get rid of toxins. I even saw a difference in my skin. It doesn't flush you out like normal detox's so don't worry about rushing to the bathroom! I will definitely be getting this again :)
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but BE REALISTIC
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this thinking you will lose a bunch of weight in two weeks just drinking this. It's unrealistic. This tea for me gave me a lot of energy and made me much less hungry throughout the day. It also has no laxatives which is rare for a tea like this. A great bonus. The tea also tastes great. While using this tea, I continued my normal workout routine and truly believe I saw more progress than without it. I will definitely be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: cause headaches!
customer_reviews.text: Its good in taste like any other green tea so easy to drink. Mid way through my first packet I noticed I was getting headaches but did not pay attention as I lost a pound ( it can be because of workout and diet, not sure) .It was when I ordered 2nd packet, it struck to me that may be my head is heavy because of this drink (this was the only change in my routine.) I stopped it for 2-3 days and my headaches were gone and not heavy at all. This is not for me but may work for youguys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product because it had good reviews. I wanted a product that would be gentle on my stomach during the workday. This product definitely helped me the first few days with losing water weight and decreased bloating. I was definitely running to the bathroom often (urinating). It gave me energy and suppressed my appetite. The flavor wasn't bad and I didn't add anything to sweetened it as I'm trying to minimize my sugar intake. I've dropped a few pounds over the last two weeks but I also work out 2-3 times a week. Overall it wasn't a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Effective and gentle detox
customer_reviews.text: Effective for helping me detox from sugar. Used in conjunction with healthy habits it does help remove excess bloat although I haven’t noticed a significant drop in weight. Taste is tolerable but a drop of honey helps. I used it steeped in hot water in the morning and then took the same bag and steeped it all day in a glass of cold water for an afternoon tea. At some point in the 14 days I had a headache but I expected it because of the yeast and sugar die off.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: It had an okay taste, never had to had anything to it and never made me cringe to drink. I did notice it helped me be more regular, but as other people pointed out it was not a huge difference, didnt make me sick or give me diarrhea though so that's good. Just very gentle stool softener was really all I got from it. One thing I noticed is that it made me feel sleepy, so i drink it at night instead of in the morning or i dont function well.
customer_reviews.author: niko

customer_reviews.title: Bloat no more!
customer_reviews.text: Zero tea really helps getting rid of bloat! I am not sure if it works for weight loss but I do feel a little jittery/energized. I do not usually consume caffeine at all, with that being said the energized feeling I get is not unpleasant. If I drink coffee I can almost pass out from the feeling. The flavor is good. I drink it cold throughout the day using 1 bag in my 32oz container, followed by at least another 25-30oz of water. I feel it does help me go to the bathroom easier but in no way do I feel uncomfortable or need to run to the toilet. It is definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Good tea
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 10 days and I can feel the difference. I have been going a lot more regularly and feel more alert. I know it is not because of the content of the tea, but how I have changed my diet. I wouldn't recommend taking this tea without first reading the instructions and consuming SUGAR or sugary stuff throughout the period of taking this tea. Sugar is just not healthy. If you do take sure, I would recommend going on a sugar detox program first, meaning, going on a 14- or more day fast from sugar. #zerotea Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Alien Country

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TAKE THIS PLEASE READ
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: I TOOK THIS PRODUCT FOR 3 DAYS AND ON THE FOURTH DAY I KNEW TO STOP TAKING THIS PRODUCT BECAUSE OF TERRIBLE HEADACHES, PRESSURE BETWEEN EYES, EARS HURTING. WENT TO THE DOCTOR AND THEY TREATED ME FOR “SINUSES”. NEEDLESS TO SAY, THIS PRODUCT WAS NOT BECAUSE OF MY SINUSES AND IT HAS CAUSED TERRIBLE THROAT PAIN AS OTHER REVIEWS HAVE STATED AS WELL. THIS PRODUCT NEEDS TO BE OFF THE MARKET. I AM SPENDING HOURS IN THE DOCTORS OFFICE TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHAT IS WRONG WITH MY THROAT AND THE PAIN. DO NOT TAKE THIS UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE IN EXCRUCIATING PAIN
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first but...🤔
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly skeptical at first due to seeing the offer that comes in the packaging after reading some of the reviews. I gave it a try anyway because of how much the reviews raved over the flavor. After trying this on my own and using it I have to say the flavor is REALLY good! And as far as results I have definitely noticed a decrease in bloating. I also like the actual tea bags. I would definitely recommend this. 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Miisz Julesz

customer_reviews.title: Yummy TEA!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually like herbal teas, but heard great things about this one and figured I'd give it a try. Not only is it very tasty but I feel it did help me detox a little. After a busy move into our new home, and then trying to finish up stuff at our old rental, we ate like crap and I needed something to help me get back on track. I decided to try the tea. I did feel a little less bloated from the crap I had been eating and this tea helped with regularity as well. Over all I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Rock

customer_reviews.title: Made me pretty sick
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 2 stars. I believe it might get the job done as far as detoxing simply because it made me go to the bathroom about 8 hours after I drank some but it also made me really sick. I was literally vomiting about 20 minutes after I drank a glass. Terrible stomach pains and acid reflux. Again, it could be just me but it was pretty bad. I gave it to someone else. Maybe theyll have success with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Porcello

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this twice. I love it. The flavor is amazing and it is a gentle cleanse. It reallly cleanses if you do it alongside a clean diet. If you’re still eating crap, then it’s not going to be as effective. The first time I did it, I didn’t follow a consistent clean diet and it still worked! Lost 3lbs. The second time, I tried being a bit more consistent and I lost 5lbs. If you can more disciplined than me, I’m sure it’ll work better for you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Don't Use During Busy Weeks!
customer_reviews.text: 24 years old* I wanted something to help with a feeling of bloating and heaviness. My biggest note is; be ready to use the bathroom often. I did this during a Covid-19 home stay- no work or reason to leave home. WOW if I were working these two weeks I would've been screwed. I was using the bathroom to poop about 5 times a day. I feel light as a feather and detoxed but I wouldn't be able to do it while keeping up a busy life. I will say; I used this along with dieting to boost things. I did Weight Watchers while taking the tea for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and it does cleanse you but it's a good thing . I have 5 tea bags left. No weight loss but it wakes me up. I'm avoiding coffee so I'm going to try one more bag for the best results. I'm a workout queen so I'm sure the next bag will be even better. Update: received offer for free tea with honest review and no response so I will going with another seller from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Steady energy and appetite suppressant.
customer_reviews.text: This actually works for me! I drink it throughout the day for steady energy and It helps supress appetite. Its a very gentle cleanser you can have every day really. It is NOT a laxative type of tea. It tastes great. Worth the price because it does what it says. Now you do have to do your part and get a plan to change your diet. Its not a miracle product, nothing is instant. This helped jumpstart my weight loss. With this, and fruit and veggie shakes for breakfast everyday, I am down 8 pounds in 2 1/2 weeks! Ordering another 4 weeks worth
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Helped with bloating
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was pretty good. I enjoyed the flavor. I did feel less bloated after drinking this, I don’t think it works miracles and if anyone is expecting to magically lose weight from this product I wouldn’t count on it. But if you are looking to feel less bloated and look a little less puffy, then this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tea! But does it work?
customer_reviews.text: I like my coffee strong and dark. I'm not a "tea guy" despite having tried black, green, white, herbal, and everything in between. The only tea I drink semi-occasionally is "Dreamtime" from Trader Joe's because I think it actually helps me sleep. However... I really, really like this tea. I originally bought it because I'd read it helps with early-morning cravings when intermittent fasting/time-restricted eating (which I practice). I'm not convinced it did anything to curb my appetite, but I definitely enjoyed the full bag (one per day) without any negative side effects. Or ... really, ANY effects besides the comfort of a decent cuppa. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I returned it after looking at the ingredients and cross referencing with them online. These teas are misleading and help reduce bloat by acting as a diuretic - it might temporarily help you lose a little water weight temporarily but not WEIGHT. I returned this after trying it.
customer_reviews.author: V.W.

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised by how much energy this tea gives me throughout the day. Drinking it at 8 AM in the morning still leaves me energetic at 8 PM at night. This gives me a lot more energy throughout the day than a cup of coffee does. I also feel less bloated. I didn’t feel of the effect the first day or two, but after drinking it every day, I’m seeing a visible difference in my energy level.
customer_reviews.author: TXShopper1

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the result of what was suppose to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the result of what was suppose to be a detox. In my mind, the purpose it served was to cleanse my colon. The taste was pleasant and did not require a sweetener. The results however, did not match the claims and was dismal. I did use the entire order but results did not get any better.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: This tea is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time losing weight! This tea is a miracle! I've lost 7 lbs in 7 days!! I haven't been working out, just cutting my meals in half!! Everyday I realize I lose another pound! I am definitely buying more to help me get ready for my wedding! The tea smells so good! It also tastes good as well! I add a tablespoon of honey to make it a little sweet.
customer_reviews.author: RRich

customer_reviews.title: Great to drink to get your day started!
customer_reviews.text: I went on a cleanse and decided to give these a try. I recommend have a tea when you wake up. It defiantly helped to get my day started. I didn't feel bloated or anything. The flavor isn't the best compared to other tea bags but defiantly does its job by flushing out all the junk in my system. I had a cup of tea every morning and at night I had the Dr. Tobias at night. These really helped me to go to the bathroom at least once a day (which I have a very bad digestive system). will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It really detoxes you!
customer_reviews.text: This tea worked as a great end of summer detox. The first week I felt horrible which is how I knew the detox was working. If you haven’t detoxed in a while it will be unpleasant for a few days but after you feel so much better. The taste is good enough to drink without sugar (though I add honey sometimes).
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: so yummy!
customer_reviews.text: i'm not sure if the tea works but i did lose a couple of lbs without doing anything so there's that. i ordered my second bag because the tea itself tastes great! its like Christmas in a cup and it doesn't upset my stomach. I drink this every morning warm and then use the tea bag to make a second cup to make into an iced tea i drink in the afternoon. i imagine this is something i will be drinking forever!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: This is the best I have felt in the last year and a half
customer_reviews.text: This tea has given me a new life with great energy and it has been the best I have felt in almost two years. This is no lie, as I have been battling illness for so long including fatigue. I needed a boost in energy along with an overall cleansing in my system!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Yummy stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have never done a tea detox and have always wanted to try one. I was hesitant how it might taste at first, but geez let me tell you! This stuff taste like Christmas in a cup! Cinnamon and nutmeg with a whole lot of other delicious flavors. I highly recommend trying this! Just drink a glass in the morning before you eat breakfast. Curbs appetite and give you a energy boosts. With exercise and healthy eating I felt less bloated and skinnier after 14 days! Just remember to drink alot of water because you want to pee alot..its a detox for a purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor with results!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. Im not a sweet drink person and this was perfect. Fruity and herbaceous, but I actually saw some results within a few days. My bloat went down and my tummy felt flatter. Im half way thru and very hapoy already. You do have to do a few things like no alcohol for the duration and eat clean and healthy. Granted those help on their own but I have done it before and not seen results this fast than when I drank the tea every morning. I am definitely going to make this a once a month routine!
customer_reviews.author: KristaGT43

customer_reviews.title: Any tea will do
customer_reviews.text: So far, not too bad. But honestly, any regular tea would be just a useful as this one. I've been told by others that I look thinner. But for those that are considering buying, I'm not overweight, I just wanted to shed a few pounds, and I love tea, so I said, why not. I can't say how this would work for people not trying to just shed a few pounds-- but maybe it will work better. Taste great, but I don't think it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I try to detox a few times a year, I came across this tea and because of the number of high reviews I decided to try it. The taste is very good. I really enjoyed especially since I do not add sweetener to my teas. Truthfully my 7 year old doesn’t care much for tea and she really liked the taste! Furthermore m, she was having tummy troubles and it actually seems to help her tummy, according to her. I would definitely recommend it helped me feels less bloated and pleasant to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cicalo

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the taste of this tea. The smell is spicy but it's super delicious. I like that this tea doesn't have any stevia in it. I ordered a tea and didn't realize it had stevia in it and I threw it out right away. Teas shouldn't have sweeteners unless you add them! As far as the detoxing and metabolism thing.. I honestly didn't drink the tea as intended for the 14 solid days so I'm not sure if results were to happen. I'm getting another bag and will hopefully do better. I'll come back and update my review if I do. Anyway, if you are looking for a tasty detox tea, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Company is paying customers to give good reviews
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this! Upon first sight, you’re like - oh this must be great it has such a high rating! Well, that’s because there’s a little paper inside saying that you’ll get another 14 days free if you give it a good review. I’ve done a few teatoxes, and this one did absolutely nothing for me - even worse, I actually felt bloated. Only did 1 week and stopped - save yourself the money and go for a real teatox!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fake free coupon - lost a customer
customer_reviews.text: The tea it’s self is good but the fake coupon inside the bag is bad business. Inside the bag is a coupon that says “free bag “ you go online and sign up, sound easy enough. So I followed the steps and once I filled out all my details it said they can’t send me a bag and that I need to try again in 7 days! 7 days, why? I read through comments and I guess I’m not the only one who has had this issue. It’s clear they just wanted my information which I would of happily provided and stayed a loyal customer. But this made me not trust the brand so I won’t buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Smells and tastes good...
customer_reviews.text: I quit drinking coffee over a month ago and as a result, I felt groggy throughout the work-day. I noticed that when I started drinking this tea in the mornings, I no longer feel tired at work. It could be due to the caffeine in this tea, but I no longer experience the side-effects of caffeine. Aside from helping me feel more energetic, unfortunately, I haven't been going #2 regularly since I started drinking this tea. I had expected that it would make my digestive flow better, and I didn't have issues with constipation before. Other than that, I love the taste of this tea and drinking it in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hooked on this tea! It has a great taste; I like to brew a cup and pour it over ice, I add water throughout the day. I also use it in my smoothies, a cup of tea (cold), ice, one plum, 1/4 cup blueberries and two scoops of vanilla protein powder. I can't say with certainty just yet if I'm losing weight from the tea or the fact that I'm working out and have eliminated alcohol; either way, I highly recommend it and have added it to my monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn

customer_reviews.title: 1 SMALL CUP OF HELP
customer_reviews.text: I HAD HIT A PLATEAU, AND EVERYTHING ELSE THAT PEOPLE WERE TELLING ME TO TRY WAS NOT WORKING. ABOUT THE THIRD DAY INTO THE 14-DAY DETOX, I STARTED NOTICING SLIGHT CHANGES IN MY ENERGY, MY SLEEP, AND YES, DIGESTION. THIS IS A VERY HELPFUL, HEALTHY PRODUCT AND ONLY ONE CUP IN THE MORNING. OTHER PRODUCTS I HAVE TRIED IN THE PAST ARE MULTIPLE CAPSULES SEVERAL TIMES A DAY. I DIDN'T SEE OR FEEL THE RESULTS WITH THOSE LIKE I HAVE WITH THIS WONDERFUL CUP OF HELP. I HAVE RECOMMENDED THIS TO MY DAUGHTER AND SHE IS WAITING HER FIRST DELIVERY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 5 stars, buuuut
customer_reviews.text: Taste: I usually drink tea with no sugar because you can't be too sure now. Zerotea doesn't give me the dull, bland flavor I usually get when having no sugar in my tea. HOWEVER, I did buy this product because I was having issues with regular cleansing. That being said, I had no help from this product at all. I tried it the first week hoping it was just taking a while, but when I started my second week, I started to become irritated and knew the product was either diluted or just not going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna

customer_reviews.title: This helps to kick start!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 14 Days. I have felt like it has helped me get back on track with healthy eating habits and making sure that I drink lots of water. I know that there was a few days that I did not eat the best but that’s life. Overall, I love that product and I will use it again soon. My suggestion is that you have a plan for yourself fitness wise and nutrition wise. I know that I did loss a pound or so hut I saw my waist get smaller and other parts get smaller as well. I highly recommend this product. #zerotea
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: This Tea Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently experiencing some bloating that was just not going away no matter what I did. After the full 14 days on this tea I can happily say my bloating is GONE! Very happy with my results, I feel completely back to normal. The tea tasted amazing, sometimes I added honey and sometimes I didn't and it was still delicious. My only quip would be that, towards the end of the 14 days, I was getting some serious headaches after drinking this tea in the morning. I'm a big coffee drinker, so was curious why the caffein was giving me such a bad headache. But all in all, this product is worthy of five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Detox Tea!!!
customer_reviews.text: You only have to drink one cup and will feel the difference. Definitely feel the energy levels. Not immediately, but the next day you will feel more energetic. You just have to make sure you drink lots of fluids. Water is essential. The only that I don't like is the smell. There is a slight pungent smell and the taste is not all that great. It's worth a try. I stopped after a few days because I wasn't drinking enough water, but once I made sure that I was getting enough water, fluids and some food, I am happy with the way I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god this tea messed me up so bad. I took it on the first day and no problems. Before I could take day 2 I had to use the bathroom. My stomach started hurting so bad and I became nauseated. I used the bathroom and that was the most excruciating bowel movement ever. I ended up busting out in cold sweats and passing out on the toilet. The rest of the day I ended up extremely thirsty with severe abdominal cramps. Do not and I mean do not purchase this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Renada B

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of this tea when you open the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this tea when you open the bag! IT IS AMAZING!! I've tried Detox teas like Skinny Tea and it smelled great when you opened it, but the taste was super weak. You can use these tea bags at least twice with great taste! Its like double for your money. I have one in the morning and it stops the crazy morning cravings and i save the tea bag for my second cup around 5-6pm when those afternoon cravings come along. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Delica Hughley

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Since my body naturally has trouble detoxifying because of a genetic mutation, I decided to try this product. I have only used it for two days (one tea bag per day) and have been so incredibly uncomfortable and bloated within an hour after drinking it and the feeling lasts all day. I tried it again on the second day because I did not want to attribute the bloating to the tea without giving it.a second chance. I typically do not have issues with bloating but after these two days, I can certainly now sympathize with people that do!
customer_reviews.author: SAI

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best tea in the world
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a ton of different teas from around the world and this one is by far my favourite. It tastes amazing and if it weren’t apart of a cleanse, I would drink it recreationally. With that bein said, this Ian my first detox tea and this was the best way to start detoxing without being too heavy on the laxatives. I never pooped regularly before this tea and now I go at a heathy rate twice, sometimes thrice, a day. I will happily be purchasing more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Definitely only steep for the recommended time!
customer_reviews.text: I left my original review as a negative one due to the horrible taste and sever stomach cramping. I figured I’d give it one more shot since the first one I lost track of time chasing toddlers and it could have sat anywhere up to about 10 min. When I re read the instructions and tried again I let it sit for the recommended 3-5 min and split the difference and did 4 with a timer it was a much better experience. Still wasn’t my favorite taste but it was 1000% better and didn’t give me stomach pains. I didn’t think it was fair to leave a bad review based on user error.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa wang

customer_reviews.title: Did not lose any weight
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the taste of this tea and it did not make me feel sick. But it has been a waste of money for me because it did not work. Not sure if it really detoxes. They should not promote something as a weight loss aid if it does not actually help you. I did not lose a single pound. I am at a healthy weight, but have been wanting to reach my goal weight for months. The scale refuses to budge despite continuous exercise and now a good caloric restriction. This tea did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Haddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Benefits, However No Weight Loss
customer_reviews.text: Ive used lots of Tea/Coffee Detoxes and everytime received some sort of positive result, and this one just got added to the list! It makes me noticeably less bloated by just having one cup, and definitely makes me feel better about myself. It also helped me go to the bathroom in the AM which i think is a great benefit considering I struggle to be regular. It tastes wonderful with or without honey (i drank it without but tried it with honey one time). However i didnt notice any extra weight loss when added to my regular diet and exercise routine. But I did enjoy drinking it and would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: josie damon

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: You ever just wonder how certain things get so many good reviews when you know it truly doesn’t work. This is it. The tea taste good to me i added a bit of honey. But that’s it. I eat healthy and work out. Thought I’d try this tea to help loose a few lbs. well nothing happened at all. Besides that it Made me a bit gassy on most days. Other than that nothing
customer_reviews.author: N.Sut

customer_reviews.title: Energy and Amazing Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love tea and I'm always looking for something new to try. The flavor of this tea is unlike anything I've ever had before and I absolutely love it. I could see that each satchel looked a little bit different with what was inside of it and it made each cup I've had taste a little bit different, one cup had a little more cinnamon, another was a little bit stronger on the orange, but they all had that same great flavor profile. I noticed after the first cup that I had a little bit more energy and was able to focus more on the task at hand. Everyone has different tastes, but for me this tea is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the nice berry flavor and aroma of the detox tea. I usually put raw Honey in my tea but I didn't need anything extra in this detox tea. I didn't experience anything spectacular after the first day or two, but by day three...wham...action. I did notice a slight decrease in bloating, but in think I need a 2nd round to be sure. I would say overall though that the Detox tea does work but depending on the sensitivity of your system, you may need to extend your Detox Plan.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this cleanse, its definitely one of the nicer cleanses to be on. I almost felt like I wasn't on a cleanse. The tea taste amazing, not bitter or anything. I really suggest following the directions where it tells you to steep it at a lower temp not boiling, I think that helps the flavor. I have done other cleanses that taste disgusting or are just plain torture and this one is really doable. I lost 9lbs after the 14 days, and felt really good.
customer_reviews.author: lw440

customer_reviews.title: Great tea, price? I think it average.
customer_reviews.text: This is like my fourth time purchasing. When I first started out, I lost about 10 lbs within a month. It did help curb my appetite in the morning because I drink it early in the morning after drinking a cup of water (that’s what the I instructions said). The smell is pleasant, the taste? A little different/strong for me, but nothing a little honey can’t fix. Like some other reviewers said, you need to put in the effort to make it work. I’m also drinking this tea with my intermittent diet, so hopefully I continue to loose some weight. 🤞🏼
customer_reviews.author: K_Money

customer_reviews.title: Flavor explosion.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical trying this. Usually they all look good however have some funky taste. This is by far the opposite. You can see the ingredients, the smell is amazing, and once you take that first sip the flavor explosion that happens is completely inviting. You can actually taste the variety of flavors. In love with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I asked a coworker how she had lost weight so fast and all she had done differently was drink this tea. My first couple of days on it I did feel bloated and cramps but after that it was smooth sailing. I lost 8lbs in a week. I I had gained 14lbs relatively fast and was looking to get rid of it relatively fast as well. Great value, my best friend is going to try it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product has made some improvements on my health
customer_reviews.text: The Detox product has a very good flavor and is easy to drink! It has been made the detox process enjoyable! This has been a good product and reducing my bloating feeling I've had with taking medications, and has helped regulate my digestive system. While I'm not naive to think there is a miracle weight loss solution out there, I just don't want people to think this will be that answer. Over time this may help to influence healthier decisions, and healthier biochemistry (through regulating digestive systems and etc.), but it will not make this happen over night.
customer_reviews.author: Benno

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Detox
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many detox teas and this one is by far the most gentle. It doesn't cause my stomach to hurt, it's all natural and it does the job. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TVang

customer_reviews.title: Need Help losing weight?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tea 3 times, and each time I used it, I lost a few pounds and was not bloated! I honestly tried other teas to save money, but they never did what this tea does. I am 60 years old and digestion is an issue along with weight trying to creep up on me. I need this tea to keep me in check and be my best. Honestly, I can't find another tea like this that helps you feel so much better. I feel energized with no bloating and weight loss is a super plus! It's worth every penny and it's good for you. You deserve to treat yourself to this tea! Angela in va
customer_reviews.author: Angela

product_meta.title: Zero Tea 14 Day Detox Tea, Weight Loss Tea, Teatox Herbal Tea for Cleanse
product_meta.description:
STEEP UP YOUR METABOLISM!

Most people struggle with their weight, don’t be discouraged, start detoxing now with Zero Tea and steep up your metabolism. We all want to look and feel better and that can be difficult if your body feels sluggish and bloated. Today’s modern American diet AKA S.A.D (Standard American Diet) has left Americans feeling sluggish, bloated, and packing on the pounds due to refined /processed ingredients, trans fats, stabilizers, artificial dyes, artificial flavorings and the lack of whole foods that contain essential nutrients, prebiotics and probiotics that our bodies are craving. What can you do? You can start by making simple yet effective changes, like drinking Zero Tea, water, eating whole foods and moving everyday. Those are life changes that will benefit you everyday for as long as you keep it up. 

WHAT SETS ZERO TEA APART?

Zero Tea is curated with ingredients that are time proven to help your body with the detoxifying process. Zero Tea is a delicious blend of organic and natural teas and spices that cleanse while boosting your metabolism and energy level. Zero Tea helps your body flush excess water that makes you feel sluggish and bloated without the harsh laxatives that other detox teas contain, it's the ultimate way to internally calm and cleanse your body. 


Included with your purchase is our free "Getting Fit & Staying Fit" eBook. eBook sent as soon as your order is confirmed.

*CAFFEINE CONTENT - AVOID IF SENSITIVE*
**EXPIRATION DATE PRINTED ON BAG**
See safety warning for potential side effects
feature_bullets: ZeroTea helps the body by charging the metabolism- promoting proper digestion, and aiding in the optimization of the digestive tract. ZeroTea's ingredients are designed to stimulate the body's ability to process excess fats, stimulate blood circulation, and provides essential antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals

Detox cleanse and metabolism booster- Our 14 and 28 day detox aids your body in cleansing and purifying itself of toxins and waste; boosts your metabolism and energy level, helps get rid of excess water, and reduces stress while still tasting great. Zero Tea consists of only the finest organic green tea, spices and herbs.

A better way to cleanse- Our blend doesn’t include the natural laxative Senna Leaf. Zerotea is a gentle detox that supports the positive bacteria in the gut; aiding the body in attaining an optimized efficiently running metabolic process.
Reduce bloating- Zerotea aids in your body's digestion, helping to relieve excessive bloating by feeding the good bacteria in your gut so that they can do there job properly.

Anti-inflammatory ingredients- Sluggish bowels are often due to an overgrowth of bacteria or Candida albicans that produce toxic metabolites slowing down processing through the colon. Many of the ingredients in Zerotea help keep elements in the colon at healthy levels.
